theory.brief: Thì Quá khứ tiếp diễn (Past Continuous) diễn tả hành động đang xảy ra trong quá khứ. Thì Quá khứ đơn (Past Simple) diễn tả hành động đã hoàn thành. 'Used to' diễn tả thói quen trong quá khứ không còn nữa.
examples: I was walking home when I saw a new house.
We used to spend a lot of money.
The phone rang while I was having dinner.

exercises.question: Mr Smith __________ home when the storm started.
exercises.explanation: Dùng quá khứ tiếp diễn (past continuous): was/were + V-ing
hints: (drive) - Hành động đang diễn ra trong quá khứ

exercises.question: I __________ a DVD on my computer when it stopped working.
exercises.explanation: Chủ ngữ 'I' dùng 'was' + V-ing
hints: (watch) - Quá khứ tiếp diễn

exercises.question: We __________ on the bus when we saw the new shops.
exercises.explanation: Chủ ngữ 'We' dùng 'were' + V-ing
hints: (travel) - Hành động đang xảy ra

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu hỏi: What / you / do / when / the phone / rang?
exercises.correctSentence: What were you doing when the phone rang
acceptedAnswers: What were you doing when the phone rang
What were you doing when the phone rang?
hints: Câu hỏi quá khứ tiếp diễn: Were you + V-ing?

exercises.question: We were walking home when we __________ a bag of rubbish.
exercises.explanation: Dùng quá khứ đơn (past simple) cho hành động ngắn
hints: (find) - Hành động ngắt quãng

exercises.question: I was cycling home when I __________ a new house.
exercises.explanation: Quá khứ đơn của 'see' là động từ bất quy tắc
hints: (see) - Động từ bất quy tắc

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: They / watch TV / when / the lights / go out
exercises.correctSentence: They were watching TV when the lights went out
acceptedAnswers: They were watching TV when the lights went out
They were watching TV when the lights went out.
hints: Hành động dài: quá khứ tiếp diễn, hành động ngắn: quá khứ đơn

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: We / have lunch // someone / knock on the door
exercises.correctSentence: We were having lunch when someone knocked on the door
acceptedAnswers: We were having lunch when someone knocked on the door
We were having lunch when someone knocked on the door.
When someone knocked on the door, we were having lunch
When someone knocked on the door, we were having lunch.
hints: Dùng 'were having' cho hành động dài

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: She / read a book // her phone / ring
exercises.correctSentence: She was reading a book when her phone rang
acceptedAnswers: She was reading a book when her phone rang
She was reading a book when her phone rang.
When her phone rang, she was reading a book
When her phone rang, she was reading a book.
hints: Dùng 'was reading' cho hành động dài

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: I / do my homework // the lights / go out
exercises.correctSentence: I was doing my homework when the lights went out
acceptedAnswers: I was doing my homework when the lights went out
I was doing my homework when the lights went out.
When the lights went out, I was doing my homework
When the lights went out, I was doing my homework.
hints: Dùng 'was doing' cho hành động đang diễn ra

exercises.question: While I (walked / was walking) to school, I (met / was meeting) my friend.
exercises.explanation: Dùng quá khứ tiếp diễn cho hành động dài hơn và quá khứ đơn cho hành động ngắn
hints: Hành động dài (walking) dùng quá khứ tiếp diễn

exercises.question: What (did you do / were you doing) when I (called / was calling) you?
exercises.explanation: Dùng quá khứ tiếp diễn cho hành động đang diễn ra và quá khứ đơn cho hành động ngắt quãng
hints: 'When I called' là hành động ngắn

exercises.question: The children (played / were playing) in the garden when it (started / was starting) to rain.
exercises.explanation: Trẻ em chơi là hành động dài hơn, mưa bắt đầu là hành động ngắt quãng
hints: Mưa bắt đầu là sự kiện đột ngột

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu hỏi: they / watch TV / when / you / arrive?
exercises.correctSentence: Were they watching TV when you arrived
acceptedAnswers: Were they watching TV when you arrived
Were they watching TV when you arrived?
hints: Câu hỏi bắt đầu bằng 'Were they...'

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu hỏi: she / study / when / the phone / ring?
exercises.correctSentence: Was she studying when the phone rang
acceptedAnswers: Was she studying when the phone rang
Was she studying when the phone rang?
hints: Câu hỏi bắt đầu bằng 'Was she...'

exercises.question: The energy bills __________ expensive.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'used to' + động từ nguyên mẫu cho thói quen quá khứ
hints: (be) - Thói quen quá khứ không còn nữa

exercises.question: We __________ a lot of money.
exercises.explanation: Used to + dạng nguyên mẫu của động từ
hints: (spend) - Thói quen quá khứ

exercises.question: Simon and Alice's family __________ a lot of rubbish away.
exercises.explanation: Thói quen quá khứ: used to + động từ nguyên mẫu
hints: (throw) - Điều từng làm trong quá khứ

exercises.question: The old owner __________ the garden.
exercises.explanation: Dạng phủ định: didn't use to + động từ nguyên mẫu
hints: (look after) - Phủ định thói quen quá khứ

exercises.question: Mum __________ to a drama club.
exercises.explanation: Phủ định: didn't use to + động từ
hints: (go) - Không làm trong quá khứ

exercises.question: I __________ vegetables when I was young.
exercises.explanation: Thói quen quá khứ ở dạng phủ định
hints: (like) - Điều không làm khi còn nhỏ

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu hỏi: they / use a lot of energy?
exercises.correctSentence: Did they use to use a lot of energy
acceptedAnswers: Did they use to use a lot of energy
Did they use to use a lot of energy?
hints: Câu hỏi: Did + chủ ngữ + use to + động từ?

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu hỏi: you / like school / when you were five?
exercises.correctSentence: Did you use to like school when you were five
acceptedAnswers: Did you use to like school when you were five
Did you use to like school when you were five?
hints: Did you use to + động từ nguyên mẫu?

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu hỏi: people / travel by car / 100 years ago?
exercises.correctSentence: Did people use to travel by car 100 years ago
acceptedAnswers: Did people use to travel by car 100 years ago
Did people use to travel by car 100 years ago?
hints: Câu hỏi về thói quen quá khứ

exercises.question: I __________ a lot of fruit juice, but now I drink water.
exercises.explanation: Thói quen quá khứ không còn nữa
hints: (drink) - Điều từng làm nhưng giờ không còn

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu hỏi: you / tidy your own room / when you were five?
exercises.correctSentence: Did you use to tidy your own room when you were five
acceptedAnswers: Did you use to tidy your own room when you were five
Did you use to tidy your own room when you were five?
hints: Câu hỏi về thói quen lúc nhỏ

exercises.question: People __________ mobile phones 50 years ago.
exercises.explanation: Phủ định: didn't use to + động từ
hints: (use) - Điều không tồn tại trong quá khứ

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'I was study when you called me.'
options: I was studying when you called me
I was study when you called me
I am studying when you called me
I were studying when you called me
exercises.explanation: Quá khứ tiếp diễn cần: was/were + V-ing
hints: Dạng quá khứ tiếp diễn thiếu -ing

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'Did you used to like vegetables?'
options: Did you use to like vegetables
Did you used to like vegetables
Do you used to like vegetables
Were you used to like vegetables
exercises.explanation: Trong câu hỏi với 'Did', dùng 'use to' không phải 'used to'
hints: Sau 'Did', dùng dạng nguyên mẫu 'use to'

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'They were play football when it started raining.'
options: They were playing football when it started raining
They were play football when it started raining
They are playing football when it started raining
They was playing football when it started raining
exercises.explanation: Quá khứ tiếp diễn: were + V-ing
hints: Thêm -ing vào động từ

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'She didn't used to wear glasses.'
options: She didn't use to wear glasses
She didn't used to wear glasses
She doesn't used to wear glasses
She wasn't used to wear glasses
exercises.explanation: Sau 'didn't', dùng 'use to' không phải 'used to'
hints: Dạng phủ định: didn't use to

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'What was you doing at 8 o'clock?'
options: What were you doing at 8 o'clock
What was you doing at 8 o'clock
What are you doing at 8 o'clock
What did you doing at 8 o'clock
exercises.explanation: Chủ ngữ 'you' dùng 'were' không phải 'was'
hints: 'You' luôn dùng 'were' trong quá khứ tiếp diễn

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'We use to live in Paris.'
options: We used to live in Paris
We use to live in Paris
We are used to live in Paris
We using to live in Paris
exercises.explanation: Dạng khẳng định: used to (có -d)
hints: Khẳng định cần 'used to' có -d
